text: Wednesday afternoon, Olympic gold medalist and gymnastics phenom Simone Biles tweeted this : there is a gavin meme for everything — Simone Biles ( @ Simone _ Biles ) August 10, 2016 Ah, yes, Gavin. The guy we all know and love. Gavin! Still confused? Biles ’ s teammate Laurie Hernandez replied with a reaction meme featuring Gavin. when you win a gold medal at the Olympics : pic. twitter. com / tyhs9gD0ya — Laurie Hernandez ( @ LaurieHernandez ) August 10, 2016 There he is!
